messages.subject: Tampa Show
messages.msgSnippet: I will be at the Tampa Show on Saturday and maybe Sunday. Following a large purchase Friday (now pending receipt), I ve decided to bring 5 or 6 higher end
messages.messageBody:
I will be at the Tampa Show on Saturday and maybe Sunday. Following a large purchase Friday (now pending receipt), I've decided to bring 5 or 6 higher end items to put on a table for sale.

Anyone care to share a table with me or sell me some space and an exhibitor badge for one of their table? ... Email me directly.

Curran






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: Tampa Show
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry to hear you can t make it, Jim.  Maybe next time. Cheers, David ... From: Jim Gilbert To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com Sent: Tuesday, January 30, 2007
messages.messageBody:
Sorry to hear you can't make it, Jim. Maybe next time.

Cheers,
David
----- Original Message -----
From: Jim Gilbert
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, January 30, 2007 9:44 PM
Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: Tampa Show


David,
Unfortunately I won't be at Tampa this year. We had tentative plans for a Nobuie presentation, but that will have to wait for another time.

Jim

Does anyone know what lectures and exhibitions are planned for the Tampa show? Is Jim Gilbert doing anything on tsuba, for example?

David Zincavage
